info.title: WhatsApp Everyone Tagger
info.description: Revolutionize your WhatsApp group management with WhatsApp Everyone Tagger. Effortlessly tag all members in any group chat with a single click. Compatible with all group types, lightning-fast, and privacy-focused. Download now and experience the magic!

features.subtitle: Cutting-edge technology meets intuitive design. Experience the future of WhatsApp group management.

allGroupTypes.title: All Group Types
allGroupTypes.description: Compatible with regular groups, communities, and enterprise groups up to 4000+ members

lightningFast.title: Lightning Fast
lightningFast.description: Tag hundreds of members in seconds with our optimized algorithm

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: Zero data collection, end-to-end privacy, open source and transparent

stepGuide.subtitle: Follow our streamlined setup process and start tagging everyone instantly

install.title: Install Extension
install.description: Add WhatsApp Everyone Tagger from Chrome Web Store

open.title: Open WhatsApp Web
open.description: Navigate to web.whatsapp.com in your browser

select.title: Select Group Chat
select.description: Open any group where you want to tag everyone

click.title: Click @everyone
click.description: Find the magical button next to send

cta.badge: Made with love for WhatsApp users worldwide
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied users who've revolutionized their WhatsApp experience. Start tagging everyone with just one click!

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: WhatsApp Everyone Tagger does not collect, store, or transmit any user data.
privacyPolicy.paragraph1: The extension operates entirely locally within your browser and only interacts with the WhatsApp Web interface when you click the "Tag Everyone" button.
privacyPolicy.paragraph2: No information is sent to any external servers, and no analytics or tracking is implemented.
privacyPolicy.paragraph3: The extension requires permissions to access the WhatsApp Web page only to identify group members and insert @ mentions in the text input field.
